scripts.build-lib: npm run build                               -w packages/ui-library -w packages/ui-library-react -w packages/ui-library-vue
scripts.publish-lib: npm publish --access public               -w packages/ui-library -w packages/ui-library-react -w packages/ui-library-vue
scripts.publish-lib:dry: npm publish --dry-run --access public -w packages/ui-library -w packages/ui-library-react -w packages/ui-library-vue
scripts.clean:radical: npm run clean:modules && npm run clean:locks && npm cache clear --force && npm cache verify
